author: cms-sw
body: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-config/commit/26e8be06d8006319b6a832f4aee051c1d4db7270 should not include fortran files in LLVM CCDB which means scram should not then process fortrans files for code-checks. This should resolve th issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29860 .
title: [BuildRile] Do not process fortran files for code-checks
